tutorial.speak:
The "My Groups" tab shows a list of all the groups you are a member of such as a Sunday School class, ministries, your small group, parent groups for your children, and groups for church-wide updates. It also includes a timeline, showing all updates from all of your groups in one place.
You can comment on any item in this timeline to discuss it with other group members.
On the right side of the page is a list of all groups you belong to. Click on one to view the details.
You will see details about the group, including the timeline for this single group and a list of group members on the right.
Click on any person to view their contact information or to send them a message.
Click the group calendar tab to see a list of upcoming events for this group.
You can click on any event to see the details and discussions.
If you are a group leader you can also add new events by clicking add event or double-clicking any date.
The conversations tab allows you to start a new conversation with your group or continue an existing one. All group members will be notified of new comments.
Finally the files section allows group leaders to upload resources such as PDF books for the group to share. Space is limited. If you need more, you can upload to a third party service like DropBox or Google Drive and link these resources in conversations.
